>
[Perfect Form Control](/Feats.aspx?ID=4763) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 135 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Form Control](/Feats.aspx?ID=4723); Strength +4

</column>

---

Thanks to magic and muscle memory, you can stay in your alternate shapes indefinitely. When you use Form Control, instead of lasting 1 hour, untamed form’s duration is unlimited (you can still Dismiss it).
name: Perfect Form Control
